duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide decision support for business areas across the enterprise.
Apply mathematical and statistical techniques to draw conclusions and make recommendations.
Participate in discussions with cross-functional teams to understand and collaborate on business objectives.
Analyze large-scale business problems and influence solution strategies.
Deliver analysis/findings to influence mid to upper-level management and drive business decisions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Analysis, Statistics, or a related field (Master's preferred)
